title: ACTREC Recruitment 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for Multi Tasking Staff Posts
description: The Advanced Centre for Treatment Research and Education in Cancer (ACTREC) has published the official notification for 2026. To fill up the various vacancies for Multi-Tasking Staff Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 08th Pass can grab this chance and apply for the ACTREC Recruitment 2026 . Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the ...
